trans-unit.source: Adds a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> to the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableBatchOperation</codeEntityReference> that merges the contents of the specified entity with the existing entity in a table.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableOperation</codeEntityReference> to the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableBatchOperation</codeEntityReference> that merges the contents of the specified entity with the existing entity in a table.

trans-unit.source: The entity whose contents are being merged.
trans-unit.target: The entity whose contents are being merged.
